oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sheaves and D-modules on Lorentzian manifolds
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jubin, Benoit
Schapira, Pierre
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Algebraic Geometry
Mathematical Physics
Mathematics - Analysis of PDEs
35A27, 58J15, 58J45, 81T20
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We introduce a class of causal manifolds which contains the globally hyperbolic spacetimes and we prove global propagation theorems for sheaves on such manifolds. As an application, we solve globally the Cauchy problem for hyperfunction solutions of hyperbolic systems.
Comment: v2: we added the hypothesis that the cone defining a causal manifold is nowhere empty and other minor corrections
